content.question:
A particle moves on the x-axis so that its position at any time t ≥ 0 is given by x(t) = 2te-t.

(a) Find the acceleration of the particle at t = 0.

frqParts.text:
A particle moves on the x-axis so that its position at any time t ≥ 0 is given by x(t) = 2te-t.

(a) Find the acceleration of the particle at t = 0.
(b) Find the velocity of the particle when its acceleration is 0.
(c) Find the total distance traveled by the particle from t = 0 to t = 5.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
